question: What is the main objective of Biju Gram Jyoti Yojana (BGJY)?
option1: To provide free LPG to rural families
explanation: It was launched in 2007-08. The objective of Biju Gram Jyoti Yojana- To electrify villages having less than 100 population and to those who are not covered under Rajiv Gandhi Grameen Vidyutikaran Yojana (RGGVY).
